title: Getting pretty tired of Graves jungle
body:
Can we get 10 bans yet? Riot needs to see certain champions perma-banned so they are forced to actually make them balanced.

Graves jungle is cancer.

replies.body: love people who play graves jungle in norms
...And he's getting a nerf next patch, according to Riot Meddler: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/yOe5FROl-quick-gameplay-thoughts-march-23

Well knowing Riot they will probably protect him by only reducing his magic resist from true grit instead of lowering early Q damage. And if that is all they do it won't change much about him. His jungle clear, early burst damage and snowballing won't be much effected.

> [{quoted}](name=DonnieDarkin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eRgrccZn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T19:59:45.965+0000)
>
> Well knowing Riot they will probably protect him by only reducing his magic resist from true grit instead of lowering early Q damage. And if that is all they do it won't change much about him. His jungle clear, early burst damage and snowballing won't be much effected.

Personally, I think that they should nerf his Q damage across the board.
